replies.msg:
My dearest & bravest Bros & Sis

By Rio

Comrades!
Fellow Hongkongers!!
Let’s go underground,
In facing such a cunning and brutal monster.
We’ll come stealth through the night,
When they think that we repine...
We’ll strike when they eat;
We’ll strike when they sleep;
We’ll strike when they laugh;
We’ll strike when they weep;
We’ll rip them with our fiercest might!
And we’ll show no mercy when they bleed!
We have no remorse when we come forth,
Cos’ we’re the bravest of our breed!

We aren’t rioting
We aren’t tryna rip out society apart

We’re tryna protect our home
Our city
From people who just wanna fuck us up and take our freedom away

We are TRUE HongKongers
Those that defy us are liars and fakes
